name: Twilight Tank
description:
Welcome to the Twilight Tank. 
Can you take care of this innocent goldfish?


They look so young, and full of life... 
You've got this. 

Play as a kid given responsibility for the first time in this hand drawn virtual pet simulator, and enjoy a splash of story.

A  downloadable game for Windows and Mac OS.

~ ~ Warning: Fish Death  ~ ~

Game by
Kayla Schroter - Art Direction
Nora Hébert- Audio
speck - Programming

Special thanks to
B
Insaniquarium
Ren'Py

Twilight Tank is a game made for Dogpit's Virtual Pet Jam of January 2022.
